title: Tash Party
description: Embroidered Kurta Set: Romantic florals, soft pastels, and intricate handwork come together to create a look that’s equal parts traditional and timeless.
Draped Dupatta: Delicate and fluid, adding grace and old-world charm with every fold.
Embellished Juttis: Comfort meets couture. The beaded detailing ties perfectly with the outfit’s intricate embroidery.
Statement Earrings: Classic gold and pearls that elevate the look with vintage-inspired glamour.
Embellished Clutch: Compact yet striking, it adds the perfect finishing sparkle to your pastel palette.
Bronzed Glow Makeup: Rosy cheeks, soft shimmer eyes, and a nude lip for that effortlessly radiant finish.
flatlayAlt: Flat lay of tash party outfit
modelAlt: Model wearing the tash party outfit styled from the flat lay
